member.name: M:Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Controllers.AssetController.SaveAsset(Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Transport.Requests.SaveAssetRequest)
member.summary: Saves the supplied asset to Azure and returns information about the created/updated asset
member.param: Contains all information about the asset

members.member:
Logs a user in based on their Email / Password combination. This method will also set a cookie 'MKAPI' which contains the JWT token. The default Expiration time is 2 hours
The request containing the needed credentials 6 The user is succesfully authenticated Some needed information is missing from the request The user is not succesfully authenticated

member.summary: Sends an email to a user containing information on how to reset his/her password.
member.response: The mail was succesfully sent
Some needed information is missing from the request
The user is not succesfully authenticated
The Send mail dependancy failed to operate
